title: Mmr and ranked???
body:
Can anyone help me? (first time playing ranked)
Heres what happened. 
1. I played my placements and went 8/10 against golds and plat players
2. It didn't give me my rank after I completed placements.
3. After it said I was in Iron 3 and I had a mmr of platinum 4 (around 1760)
4. after a game my mmr dropps to gold 2?
5. next game I WON and my mmr tanks to bronze 1?
6. still playing well against plat players and carrying often and im in this elo??
7. Hallpppppp pliiiisssss????!?!!? Can someone fix this???!?!?

replies.body: Where are you seeing this MMR number?

Hello @MagicFlyingLLama, Thank you for responding...
Im using Op.GG right now to check my MMR.

Thank you
op.gg cant actually see MMR values. It just guesses at them based on the games you play and who you played again, and guesses very badly in general, especially early in the season.
